description:
The Mid-Season Invitational (MSI) is an annual Riot Games-organized tournament for League of Legends, a multiplayer online battle arena video game. It is the second most important international League of Legends tournament, behind only the World Championship. Eleven teams compete - each of the premier League of Legends leagues has a team representing them. The 2022 Mid-Season Invitational will be held from May 10 to 29, 2022, in Busan, South Korea. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if SK Telecom T1 wins The 2022 MSI tournament and to "No" otherwise. If the winner of the tournament is not known by July 6, 2022 (11:59:59 PM ET), this market will resolve to "No".

This market will resolve according to official information from Riot Games, the tournament's organizer, either from their website (https://lolesports.com/) or Twitter profiles (https://twitter.com/LeagueOfLegends, https://twitter.com/riotgames).

markets.question: League of Legends: will T1 (South Korea) win The 2022 Mid-Season Invitational?

title: League of Legends: will T1 (South Korea) win The 2022 Mid-Season Invitational?
